metadata.title: CVE-2023-51704 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.35.14, 1.36.x through 1.39.xbefore 1.39.6, and 1.40.x before 1.40.2. Inincludes/logging/RightsLogFormatter.php, group-*-member messages can resultin XSS on Special:log/rights.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-51704` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.39.6-1
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.39.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.39.6-1').
